nodes.text: Colonel Lom Melams was a man, who served in the Alliance to Restore the Republic during the Galactic Civil War.

Melams was the commander of the DVL-181, an Alliance outpost that was located on the planet Aracara. He was the highest ranking Alliance officer in the region and had several Alliance Special Operations teams under his command.
Melams was dedicated to the Alliance. He expected success from those he commanded and was intolerant of incompetance, so became very angry and unhappy when people failed him.
